line.text:
Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE
Apr 15 - 19 • Apr 22 - 26 (except Apr 17)
Mon to Fri, 10:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Flatbush Av-bound [2] [5] trains skip E Tremont Av, 174, Freeman, Simpson Sts, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [2] or [5] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a Wakefield-bound [2] or Eastchester-bound [5].

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [5] to E 180 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2] or [5].

Alternate travel note:
For service from Simpson St, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs, take the Bx4 bus instead. Transfer to the [2] or [5] at 3 Av-149 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.

Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until April 19
Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Woodlawn-bound [4] trains skip 161 St, 167 St, 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

Alternate travel notes:
From 161 St, take the [D] to nearby stations.
From 176 St, take the Bx32 bus. Transfer to the [4] at Burnside Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.




Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE
Apr 15 - 19 • Apr 22 - 26 (except Apr 17)
Mon to Fri, 10:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Flatbush Av-bound [2] [5] trains skip E Tremont Av, 174, Freeman, Simpson Sts, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [2] or [5] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a Wakefield-bound [2] or Eastchester-bound [5].

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [5] to E 180 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2] or [5].

Alternate travel note:
For service from Simpson St, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs, take the Bx4 bus instead. Transfer to the [2] or [5] at 3 Av-149 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until April 19
Mon to Fri, 10 AM to 3:30 PM
[W] Service is replaced by [N] trains between 57 St-7 Av, Manhattan and Ditmars Blvd, Queens
[W] Trains run every 20 minutes in Manhattan


[W] Trains run between Whitehall St and 57 St-7 Av, and via the [Q] to/from 96 St.

• Transfer between [N] and [W] trains at 57 St-7 Av (across the platform).

Alternate travel note:
[R] service is also available at 5 Av/59 St and Lexington Av/59 St. Transfer between [R] and [W] trains at 57 St-7 Av.




Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Apr 16 - 19, Tue to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Astoria-bound [N] trains skip 39 Av, 36 Av, Broadway and 30 Av in Queens


For service to these stations, take the [N] to Ditmars Blvd and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N].

For service from these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer to an Astoria-bound [N].

Notes:
[W] trains will not run in Astoria during this time.
Astoria Blvd [N] [W] station is temporarily closed.

line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 04/18/2019  3:23PM

B82 bus service has resumed following an earlier crane operation and construction on E 103 St and Glenwood Rd.

Service Change  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:01PM

B64 and B70 buses are detoured because of road construction on 8 Av and 70 St.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via 8 Av, right on 72 St, right on 7 Av, left on 70 St and then resume the regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made.



Service Change  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:01PM

B52 buses are detoured in both directions because of DOT road work on Irving Av between Green Av and Central Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound towards Ridgewood: Via Gates Av, right on Knickerbocker Av, right on Menahan St, right on Myrtle Av, left on Palmetto St,Â and then resume the regular route.

Westbound towards Cadman Plaza: Via Gates Av, right on Myrtle Av, leftÂ on Harman St, left on Wilson Av,Â Â left on Gates Av and then resume the regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made.



Planned Detour
From 7 AM to 4:30 PM, Mon to Fri, until further notice

Buses run via Schaefer St making corresponding stops.

Right on Schaefer St
Left on Bushwick Av
Right on Cooper Av then regular route

Until further notice

Planned Detour
Until further notice
Northbound B24 buses may experience delays due to construction on Greenpoint Avenue at West Street

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:21PM

BX3, BX7, BX11, BX13, BX35, BX36, BX36-LTD and M100 buses are running with delays in both directions because of lane closures on the George Washington Bridge.

Delays  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:01PM

Bx31 buses are running with delays in both directions because of a disabled vehicle on 233 St and Webster Av.

Planned Detour
Until further notice
Bx19 stops on Southern Blvd between Freeman St and 174 St are closed due to road work


The following stops will not be made:
• Southern Blvd at Jennings St
• Southern Blvd at 172 St
• Southern Blvd at 173 St
• Southern Blvd at 174 St (northbound)

Please use nearby temporary stops on:
• Louis Nine Blvd at 170 St
• Boston Rd at Louis Nine Blvd (northbound)
• Boston Rd at Seabury Pl (northbound)
• Boston Rd at E 173 St (southbound)

The northbound stop on Southern Blvd at Boston Rd will be made on Boston Rd at Southern Blvd.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:21PM

BX3, BX7, BX11, BX13, BX35, BX36, BX36-LTD and M100 buses are running with delays in both directions because of lane closures on the George Washington Bridge.

Delays  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:01PM

M9 and M22 buses are running with delays in both directions because of traffic on Worth St, Centre St, Chambers St and Park Row.

Planned Detour
Until further notice
Westbound M72 buses bypass the stop on 72 St at 1 Av due to utility work


Please use nearby stops on 72 St at 2 Av or York Av at 72 St.




Planned Detour
Until further notice
M7 stops on 16 St at 7 Av and 6 Av at 18 St are closed due to construction


A drop-off stop will be made on 18 St at 7 Av, the last/first stop will be made on 18 St at 6 Av.




Planned Detour
Through December 2019
M60 SBS - Connections to the [N] [W] at Astoria Blvd station are not available


The Astoria Blvd [N] [W] Station in Queens is temporarily closed through December 2019.

Travel alternative:

LaGuardia Link Q70 SBS is available for Terminals B, C and D, (Q47 for Terminal A) connecting with the subway at 74 St-Roosevelt Av [7] [E] [F] [M] [R] | Q47 or 61 St-Woodside [7]

• Transfer between [N] [W] and [7] trains at Queensboro Plaza.

Reminder: [W] trains operate weekdays only.




Planned Detour
Until further notice
Westbound M31 and M57 stop on W 57 St at 6 Av has been relocated due to construction


Please follow directional signage to the nearby temporary drop-off only stop on W 57 St near 6 Av.





Planned Detour
Until further notice
Westbound M22 buses are rerouted from Worth St at Centre St to Lafayette St due to Con Edison work


Buses make corresponding stops along the detoured route.

Show Reroute Details
Via Worth St
Right on Centre St
Left on Leonard St
Left on Lafayette St then regular route





Planned Detour
In effect
Lincoln Center-bound M20 no longer stops on Battery Pl at Washington St


To help alleviate traffic congestion in the area of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel, weÂve consolidated some stops along Battery Place.

Please use nearby stops on Battery Pl at West St or State St at Bridge St




Planned Detour
Until further notice
M14D buses are rerouted from 18 St between 10 Av and 11 Av


Due to construction:

Eastbound
• The 11 Av at 17 St bus stop will be made on 18 St at 10 Av.

Westbound
• The 11 Av at 15 St and 17 St bus stops will be made on 10 Av at 16 St (M11 bus stop).




Planned Detour
Until further notice
Northbound M101/M101 LTD, M102 and M103 stop on 3 Av at 23 St is closed due to NYCDOT construction


Please use the nearby stop on 3 Av at 21 St or a temporary stop on 3 Av between 24 St and 25 St.




Planned Detour
Effective immediately
Southbound M1 and M55 bus stop on Broadway at Waverly Pl is bypassed due to construction


Please use a nearby temporary stop one block south, on Broadway at Washington Pl.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:50PM

Q32,Â Q60,Â Q101, andÂ Q102Â buses will use the main roadway Manhattan-bound and pick up on the island opposite the stop because of a road obstruction on Queens Plaza between 27 St and 28 St.

Detour is as follows:

Q102Â 
Roosevelt Island-bound: Via Jackson Av, Right onto 43 Av, Right onto 21 St, Resume regular route.Â 


Service Change  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:02PM

Q17 and Q27 buses will not stop on Main St between 39 Av and Roosevelt Av because of construction.

Customers can board/alight on Main St and Kissena Blvd adjacent from the Queens Public Library.



Service Change  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:01PM

Q11 buses are detoured because of construction on Pitkin Av between 97 St to Centerville St.

Detour Is as follows:

Southbound: Via Pitkin Av, right on 96 Pl, left on 149 Av, right on Centerville StÂ and then resume the regularÂ route.

Corresponding stops will be made.Â 



Service Change  Posted: 04/18/2019  2:01PM

Q102 buses are detoured because of NYCT track work on 31 St between Broadway and 31 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound to 27 Av/2 St: Via 31 St, right on Broadway, left on 33 St, left on 30 Av, and then resume the regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along the detour safe.



Planned Detour
From 12:01 AM Wed, Apr 17 to 11:59 PM Fri, Apr 26
LaGuardia Link Q70 SBS buses are fare free during Spring Break


Ride free on the LaGuardia Link Q70 SBS. Customers do not have to
obtain a Select Bus Service ticket and may board at any door.




Planned Detour
Until further notice
Q113 LTD and Q114 LTD buses are detoured from Liberty Av at 160 St in both directions due to construction - No stops are missed

Until further notice

Detour is as follows:

S52 St George Ferry-bound: Via Olympia Blvd, right on Hickory Blvd, left on Foch Av, left on Jerome Av, right on Olympia Blvd and then resume their regular route.

S52 SI Hospital-bound: Via Olympia Blvd, left onÂ Jerome Av, right on Foch Av, right on Hickory Av, left on Olympia Blvd and then resume their regular route.

line.name: SIM1 - SIM35
line.text:
Planned Detour
Until further notice
Northbound SIM7, SIM9 and SIM33 buses bypass the stop on West St at North Moore St due to construction


A temporary drop-off stop will be made on West St between Hubert St and Laight St.




Planned Detour
NJDOT CONSTRUCTION | Through Summer 2021
Staten Island Express buses using the Lincoln Tunnel may experience delays


The New Jersey Department of Transportation will conduct a major construction project that will impact Staten Island express buses using the Lincoln Tunnel. We are working to provide the best service possible during this disruption, but travel times may be longer as a result.




Planned Detour
Effective immediately
Southbound SIM1c, SIM3c, SIM4c, SIM7, SIM9, SIM33 and SIM33c bus stop in Manhattan on Broadway at Waverly Pl is bypassed due to construction


Please use a nearby temporary stop one block south, on Broadway at Washington Pl

Reminder: SIM7, SIM9 and SIM33 buses do not operate weekends.




Planned Detour
Effective immediately
The Staten Island-bound SIM6, SIM11, SIM22 and SIM26 bus stop has been restored on Lexington Av at 52 St


The temporary stop for these routes at 53 St is discontinued.




Planned Detour
Effective immediately
Southbound SIM6 and SIM11 terminal on 57 St at Lexington Av has been relocated to alleviate congestion on 57 St


Please use the new terminal on Lexington Av at 56 St.
